Nicholes Wong, Diploma in Business Management at Nanyang PolytechnicLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 29 Mar 2019Singapore ETFs are pretty mediocre and not much to choose from. I would recommend robo advisors for more choices and diversification. You can also buy overseas ETFs yourself through a broker but do your research first.0 comments0
